LanguageData.VV_Command_CancelReserveWeaponDesc: Cancels the currently reserved weapon equip.
LanguageData.VV_Command_EquipWeaponDesc: Equips the selected weapon to the gunholder. Melee weapons or biocoded weapons cannot be equipped.
LanguageData.VV_Command_NewGrowArcanePlantBillDesc: Starts the cultivation of a new arcane plant.
LanguageData.VV_Command_CancelGrowArcanePlantBillDesc: Cancels the scheduled arcane plant cultivation. If cultivation has already begun, the spent resources are non-refundable.
LanguageData.VV_Command_ToggleLayEggDesc: Sets whether or not this royal vivi spawns eggs.
LanguageData.VV_Designator_FortifyHoneycombWallDesc: Fortify the honeycomb walls with lifestrands. The fortified walls are non-flammable but slightly less resistant to impacts. \nRequires one lifestrand for each wall.
